bs-expiry-extension-description: Pages can be marked as expired.
apihelp-bs-expiry-store-description: Serves the data for Special:Expiry overview grid
apihelp-bs-expiry-tasks-description: Executes tasks like update and delete for Special:Expiry overview grid
bs_expiry-unexpire-unsuccess: The page could not be unexpired
bs-expiry-text-delete: Do you really want to delete {{PLURAL:$1|this expiry|these $1 expiries}}?
bs-expiry-flyout-intro: Overview of expirations for this page
bs-expiry-flyout-form-title: Create a new expiry for this page
bs-expiry-flyout-expiry-not-set: This page is not set to expire!
bs-expiry-edit-grid-empty: No edits since the page expired
bs-expiry-alert-body-expired: This page expired on $1. Please check the content.
bs-expiry-pref-enablepdfwatermark: Show watermark for expired pages in PDF
bs-expiry-pref-enableprintwatermark: Show watermark for expired pages in print version
apihelp-bs-expiry-tasks-summary: Provides tasks such as editing or deleting expiries
apihelp-bs-expiry-store-summary: Provides a store for expires, that can be queried
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-expiry-daily-cat: Notfiy me when a page expires today
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-expiry-weekly-cat: Notfiy me when a page expires in a week
notification-bs-expiry-today-web-body:
The page "$1" has expired. Please review the page's content to decide whether it needs to be updated. If the page content is still up-to-date, you can simply unexpire the page. 

Expiry comment:
$2
notification-bs-expiry-today-email-body:
The page "$1" has expired. Please review the page's content to decide whether it needs to be updated. If the page content is still up-to-date, you can simply unexpire the page. 

Expiry comment:
$2
notification-bs-expiry-one-week-web-body:
The page "$1" will expire this week. Please review the page's content to decide whether it needs to be updated. 

Expiry comment:
$2
notification-bs-expiry-one-week-email-bo:
The page "$1" will expire this week. Please review the page's content to decide whether it needs to be updated. 

Expiry comment:
$2
